item.title: How to Store NPM Packages Cache on a Local Server
item.description: If you want to move the Node.js/React package cache to a local server, there are several approaches you can consider. One of them is using a private npm registry like Verdaccio and setting it up on your server. Install and configure Verdaccio on your local server. You can find more information on the Verdaccio project’s website (https://verdaccio.org/). Run the Verdaccio server on your local server. It will act as a private repository for your packages.
